Structs/Point.html#/s:FV3App5PointcFT1xS.name: init(x:y:)
Structs/Point.html#/s:FV3App5PointcFT1xS.abstract: Creates a point with coordinates specified as integer values.

Structs/Point.html#/s:vV3App5Point16debu.name: debugDescription
Structs/Point.html#/s:vV3App5Point16debu.abstract: A textual representation of the point’s coordinate values.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.name: size
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.abstract: A size that specifies the height and width of the rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: init(x:y:width:height:)
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: Creates a rectangle with coordinates and dimensions specified as floating-point values.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: init(x:y:width:height:)
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: Creates a rectangle with coordinates and dimensions specified as integer values.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:ZvV3App9Rectan.name: zero
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:ZvV3App9Rectan.abstract: The null rectangle, representing an invalid value.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: init()
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: The rectangle whose origin and size are both zero.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.name: minX
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns the smallest value for the x-coordinate of the rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.name: midX
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns the x-coordinate that establishes the center of a rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.name: maxX
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns the largest value of the x-coordinate for the rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.name: minY
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns the smallest value for the y-coordinate of the rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.name: midY
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns the y-coordinate that establishes the center of the rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.name: maxY
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns the largest value for the y-coordinate of the rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: insetBy(dx:dy:)
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns a rectangle that is smaller or larger than the source rectangle, with the same center point.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: offsetBy(dx:dy:)
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns a rectangle with an origin that is offset from that of the source rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: extend(_:)
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: Extend a rectangle to include the point if it does not fall within the rectangle

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: union(_:)
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns the smallest rectangle that contains the two source rectangles.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: contains(_:)
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: Returns whether the first rectangle contains the second rectangle.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.name: debugDescription
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:vV3App9Rectang.abstract: Creates a rectangle from a canonical dictionary representation.

Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.name: equalTo(_:)
Structs/Rectangle.html#/s:FV3App9Rectang.abstract: A representation of the rectangle for use in Playgrounds.

Structs/Size.html#/s:FV3App4SizecFT5widt.name: init(width:height:)
Structs/Size.html#/s:FV3App4SizecFT5widt.abstract: Creates a size with dimensions specified as integer values.

Structs/Size.html#/s:FV3App4SizecFT_S0_.name: init()
Structs/Size.html#/s:FV3App4SizecFT_S0_.abstract: Creates a size with zero width and height.

Structs/Size.html#/s:vV3App4Size16debugD.name: debugDescription
Structs/Size.html#/s:vV3App4Size16debugD.abstract: A textual representation of the size’s dimensions.
